ingredients.item: 25g essential Waitrose Pitted Black Olives, sliced
400g essential Waitrose Cannellini Beans, drained and rinsed

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200°C, gas mark 6. Place the chicken in a roasting dish.
Mix the breadcrumbs, tomato paste, 1-2 tbsp water, olives and half the basil and press onto the chicken and bake for 20-25 minutes. Ensure the chicken is cooked through with no pink meat.
Meanwhile, crush the beans with the remaining basil and oil and heat in the microwave on full power for 2 minutes. Season and serve with the chicken.
